title: Flipkart Clone
description: E-commerce web app emulating Flipkart is a MERN stack project, encompassing product catalog, user authentication, shopping cart, payment integration, ensuring scalability and responsiveness.

title: Dashboard
description: Currently working on full-stack dashboard project using Ruby on Rails which fetchs real time data from sensors and shows the reading based on the calculated values depending on the parameters

title: HMS
description: The Hospital Management System (HMS) is a Java-based project for efficient handling of patient data, doctor information, and billing. It utilizes Java, OOP, and a user-friendly UI with Swing and JOptionPane.
